card.name: CW01 — Enraptured Woodsman
card.text: Lifelink Enraptured Woodsman gets +1/+1 if you control an enchantment.

card.name: CW02 — Armont's Seeker
card.text: Flying Whenever one or more enchanted creatures attack, you gain 1 life.

card.name: CW03 — Vance's Squire
card.text: Vigilance Vance’s Squire has lifelink as long as you control another knight.

card.name: CW04 — Hylda's Apprentice
card.text: Hylda’s Apprentice gets +1/+0 if you control an artifact or an enchantment. It gets +2/+0 instead if you control both.

card.name: CW05 — Relic Hunter's Familiar
card.text: Whenever a historic permanent you control enters, scry 1. (Artifacts, legendaries, and Sagas are historic.)

card.name: CW06 — Hunting Eagle
card.text: Flying When Hunting Eagle enters, create a Food token.

card.name: CW07 — False Heir
card.text: When False Heir enters, create a Royal Role token attached to it. (If you control another Role on it, put that one into the graveyard. Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has ward {1}.) Sacrifice an Aura: False Heir gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: CW08 — Gallant Jouster
card.text: Gallant Jouster gets +2/+0 if you control three or more creatures.

card.name: CW10 — Ardenvale Rally
card.text: Create two 2/2 white Knight creature tokens with vigilance. Adamant — If at least three white mana was spent to cast this spell, you gain 3 life.

card.name: CW09 — Seeker of Heroes
card.text: Flying When Seeker of Heroes enters, create a Young Hero role token attached to another target creature you control. (If you control another Role on it, put that one into the graveyard. Enchanted creature has “Whenever this creature attacks, if its toughness is 3 or less, put a +1/+1 counter on it.”)

card.name: CW11 — Graceful Giant
card.text: Graceful Giant costs {1} less to cast for each Aura you control. --- Target creature gains hexproof until end of turn.

card.name: CW12 — Eriette's Lullaby
card.text: Destroy target tapped creature. You gain 2 life.

card.name: CW13 — Rose's Erasure
card.text: When Rose’s Erasure enters, exile target creature until Rose’s Erasure leaves the battlefield. Create a 1/1 green Human enchantment creature token.

card.name: CW14 — Swift Baking
card.text: Create a Food token. Draw a card.

card.name: CW15 — Disenchantive Mentality
card.text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. Scry 1.

card.name: UW01 — Valiant Treasurer
card.text: Vigilance Whenever a token enters under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on Valiant Treasurer.

card.name: UW02 — Mob Rallier
card.text: When Mob Rallier enters, create two 1/1 green Human enchantment creature tokens. Whenever a token you control enters or attacks, you gain 1 life.

card.name: UW03 — Enhanceable Simulacrum
card.text: Enhanceable Simulacrum’s power is equal to the number of artifacts and enchantments you control.

card.name: UW04 — Enhancing Beast
card.text: When Enhancing Beast enters, put X +1/+1 counters on another target creature, where X is the number of artifacts and enchantments you control.

card.name: UW05 — Knight of Relics
card.text: Historic permanents you control have ward {2}. (Artifacts, legendaries, and Sagas are historic. Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {2}.)

card.name: UW06 — Relic Hunter's Steed
card.text: Flying This spell costs {1} less to cast for each historic permanent you control. (Artifacts, legendaries, and Sagas are historic.)

card.name: UW07 — Auric Warrior
card.text: Whenever Auric Warrior deals combat damage to a player, it deals X damage to that player, where X is the number of Auras you control. Auric Warrior has double strike as long as it’s enchanted.

card.name: UW08 — Eriette's Defense
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 for each Aura you control.

card.name: UW09 — Indebted Squire
card.text: Whenever Indebted Squire deals combat damage to a player, that player may pay {1}. If they don’t, you create a 2/2 white Knight creature token with vigilance.

card.name: UW10 — Inspiring Jouster
card.text: Other Knights you control get +1/+1.

card.name: UW11 — Pot of Stew
card.text: When Pot of Stew enters, create a 1/1 green Human enchantment creature token. {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Pot of Stew: You gain 3 life.

card.name: UW12 — Will's Tenuous Peace
card.text: I — You and target opponent each draw two cards. II — Until the start of your next turn, spells cost {1} more to cast. III — Each opponent may pay {1}. You create a Food token for each opponent who didn’t.

card.name: UW13 — Ardenvale Gatekeeping
card.text: This spell costs {1} more to cast for each target chosen that you don’t control. Exile up to one target creature, up to one target artifact, and up to one target enchantment, then return the permanents that you own from among the exiled permanents to the battlefield under your control.

card.name: UW14 — Unlikely Virtue
card.text: Create a Virtuous Role token attached to target creature. (If you control another Role on it, put that one into the graveyard. Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 for each enchantment you control.) --- Exile target spell. It becomes on an adventure.

card.text: Flying --- Scry 1. Draw a card, then discard a card.

card.text: Whenever you draw your second card each turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Farsight Frog.

card.name: CU07 — Obyra's Warcaller
card.text: Flying When Obyra’s Warcaller enters, create a 1/1 black Faerie enchantment creature token with flying.

card.text: Scheming Giant costs {1} less to cast for each artifact or enchantment you control. --- Create a token copy of target artifact you control with mana value 2 or less.

card.name: CU09 — Grigog's Enhancement
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+3. If enchanted creature has a card type other than creature, it has flying.

card.name: CU10 — Adamant Negation
card.text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {3}. Adamant — If at least three blue mana was spent to cast this spell, create a 0/2 blue Frog enchantment creature token.

card.text: Equipped creature gets +2/+1. Equip {3}. This ability costs {2} less to activate if you cast a spell from anywhere other than your hand this turn. --- Create a 0/2 blue Frog enchantment creature token.

card.text: Draw three cards. Create a 0/2 blue Frog enchantment creature token.

card.text: When Auric Sight enters or leaves the battlefield, draw a card. 1U: Sacrifice Auric Sight.

card.text: Flying Spells you cast from anywhere other than your hand cost {1} less to cast.

card.text: I — Will’s Caution gains “Whenever you draw a card, put a +1/+1 counter on Will’s Caution.” II — Draw a card. III — Move Will’s Caution’s +1/+1 counters to target creature.

card.name: UG13 — Garenbrig Gatekeeping
card.text: This spell costs {1} more to cast for each target chosen that has two or more card types. Choose up to one target creature, up to one target artifact, and up to one target enchantment. Destroy the chosen noncreature permanents. Target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to each of the chosen creature permanents.

card.name: UG14 — Unlikely Growth
card.text: For each creature you control, create a Monster Role token attached to that creature. (If you control another Role on it, put that one into the graveyard. Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has trample.) --- Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

card.name: UM07 — Grumgully, Wilden Speaker
card.text: Reach Whenever another non-Human creature you control enters, put a +1/+1 counter on Grumgully, Wilden Speaker.

card.name: UM05 — Skeril, True Piper
card.text: If one or more +1/+1 counters would be put on an Army or Rat you control, that many plus one +1/+1 counters are put on it instead.

card.name: UM03 — Obyra, Fey Champion
card.text: Flying Non-faerie creatures get -1/-0.

card.name: UM01 — Hylda, Retired Witch
card.text: Whenever Hylda, Retired Witch attacks, if you control an artifact or an enchantment, tap target creature. If you control both, tap up to three target creatures instead.

card.name: UM19 — Syr Vance, Stalwart Hero
card.text: First strike Other Knights you control have first strike.

card.name: UM14 — Oliver's Theft
card.text: I — Create a 1/1 green Human enchantment creature token. II — Create a 1/1 black Faerie enchantment creature token with flying. III — Sacrifice any number of enchantments. Add X mana of any one color, where X is the number of enchantments sacrificed this way.

card.name: UM15 — Grigog, Gingerhorde Marshal
card.text: Other creatures you control with another card type get +1/+1.

card.name: UM17 — Johann, Chaotic Sorcerer
card.text: Whenever you cast a spell from anywhere other than your hand, draw a card. Johann, Chaotic Sorcerer deals 1 damage to each opponent.

card.name: UM11 — Syr Armont, the Betrayer
card.text: Whenever Syr Armont, the Betrayer attacks, it gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of Auras you control.

card.name: UM10 — Rose's Discovery
card.text: I, II, III — Mill three cards. You may return a historic card from among the milled cards to your hand. If you don’t, you gain 2 life. (Artifacts, legendaries, and Sagas are historic.) ​ ​

card.name: UM18 — Johann's Failure
card.text: Johann’s Failure gains “You may look at the top card of your library at any time, and you may cast spells from the top of your library.” Scry 2. ​

card.name: UM16 — Grigog's Tactics
card.text: Create a 1/1 green Human enchantment creature token. Creatures you control with another card type get +1/+1 until end of turn. ​

card.name: UM06 — Skeril's Servitude
card.text: Amass Rats 2. (Put two +1/+1 counters on an Army you control. It’s also a Rat. If you don’t control one, create a 0/0 black Rat Army creature token first.) Skeril’s Servitude deals X damage to any target, where X is the number of counters on Armies you control. ​

card.name: UM12 — Armont's Betrayal
card.text: Create a 2/2 white Knight creature token with vigilance. Create a Wicked role token attached to target creature you control. (If you control another Role on it, put that one into the graveyard. Enchanted creature gets +1/+1. When this Aura is put into a graveyard, each opponent loses 1 life.) Each opponent loses X life and you gain X life, where X is the number of Auras you control.

card.name: UM08 — Grumgully's Teachings
card.text: I — Create a 1/1 red Goblin creature token. II — Grumgully’s Teachings deals 2 damage to each Human creature. III — Create a monster role attached to each non-Human creature you control.

card.name: UM04 — Obyra's Awakening
card.text: (As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.) Flash I — Counter target creature spell. II — Faerie spells you cast cost {1} less this turn. III — Faeries you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: UM09 — Rose, Pursuer of History
card.text: Historic spells you cast cost {1} less to cast. (Artifacts, legendaries, and Sagas are historic.) Whenever you cast a historic spell, you may pay {2}. If you do, draw a card.

card.name: UM02 — Hylda's Change of Heart
card.text: Create a Sorcerer Role token attached to target creature. (If you control another Role on it, put that one into the graveyard. Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has “Whenever this creature attacks, scry 1.”) Create a Food token. You gain X life, where X is the number of artifacts and enchantments you control.

card.name: UM20 — Vance's Act of Heroism
card.text: Create a 2/2 white Knight creature token with vigilance. Non-Knight creatures lose first strike and double strike until end of turn. ​

card.name: UM13 — Oliver, Stolen Child
card.text: When Oliver, Stolen Child enters, create a Cursed Role token attached to it. (If you control another Role on it, put that one into the graveyard. Enchanted creature is 1/1.) 1BG, Sacrifice an enchantment: Draw a card. You gain 1 life.

card.name: CA01 — Gingerbrute
card.text: Haste {1}: Gingerbrute can’t be blocked this turn except by creatures with haste. {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Gingerbrute: You gain 3 life.

card.name: CC01 — Archon's Herald
card.text: When Archon’s Herald enters, scry 1. {4}, Sacrifice Archon’s Herald: Search your library for a card that transforms into an Archon, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Spend only one color of mana to activate this ability.

card.name: CA02 — Clockwork Friend
card.text: --- Scry 3.

card.name: CA03 — Voidflower Stew
card.text: When Voidflower Stew enters, draw a card. {7}, {T}, Sacrifice Voidflower Stew: Exile target permanent. You gain 3 life.

card.name: CA04 — Monolith of Heroics
card.text: {T}: Add one mana of any color. {T}: Add two mana of any color. Spend this mana only to cast Adventure spells.

card.name: CC02 — Questseek
card.text: Reveal the top three cards of your library. Put a land card or a card with an Adventure from among them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: UA01 — Gingerogue
card.text: Gingerogue can’t be blocked. {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Gingerogue: You gain 3 life.

card.name: UC01 — Dusty Spectre
card.text: Flash

card.name: UA02 — It that Serves
card.text: {T}: Add two mana of any one color among permanents you control.

card.name: UC02 — Wall of Nothing
card.text: Defender When Wall of Nothing becomes the target of a spell or ability, sacrifice it.

card.name: UA03 — Adamantine Orb
card.text: Multikicker {2}. Spend only one color of mana to pay for Adamantine Orb’s multikicker ability. (You may pay an additional {2} any number of times as you cast this spell.) Adamantine Orb enters with a charge counter on it for each time it was kicked. {T}: Add {C} for each charge counter on Adamantine Orb.

card.name: UC04 — Dusty Anthem
card.text: Creatures you control get +0/+1.

card.name: UC03 — Cannon Fodder Role
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +3/-1.

card.name: UL01 — The Archon's Curse
card.text: I — The Archon’s Curse gains “{T}: Add {C}.” II — The Archon’s Curse gains “{T}: Add one mana of any color.” III — You may search your library for an Archon card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

card.name: UL02 — Layered Wastes
card.text: Enchant land {T}: Add {C}. Whenever enchanted land is tapped for mana, if Layered Wastes is untapped, you may tap Layered Wastes. If you do, add another mana of each mana enchanted land was tapped for.

card.name: UL03 — Accursed Soil
card.text: Enchant player Whenever enchanted player casts a spell, add {C}.
